mapper.update: update question set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, choice_number = #{choiceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, choice_total = #{choiceTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qa_number = #{qaNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qa_total = #{qaTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select question_id, category_id, title, `status`, user_id, post_time, choice_number, choice_total, qa_number, qa_total, total, content from question where question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select question_id, category_id, title, `status`, user_id, post_time, choice_number, choice_total, qa_number, qa_total, total, content from question
